title: The Beginning
description: If you have ever wished you could eradicate the ailments that plague your being, Dr. Cohn invites you to participate in his research project at Triton University. Whether you want to perfect your vision, strengthen your mind and body, or improve your looks, Dr. Cohn will engineer a solution tailored to your specific needs. Space is limited, so sign up now. There are killer side effects. Vegetarians need not apply.
author: Drew Silver
